title: I Miss When Enchanters Were Actually Enchanters
body:
And not just incredibly squishy poke mages that can give you a 100 health shield. 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
hey man, everyone was pissed that enchanters could legitimately save people because in season 7 they were actual champions, now that they cant, we get a meta where EVERYONE can kill each other, because when they decided to nerf enchanters damage remained untouched.

basically, the playerbase played itself.
i miss the days when enchanters werent equivalent to point and clicking your ADC, autopath, and then alt tabbing

> [{quoted}](name=AÏnz  Ooal  Gown,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r23IhNUv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-12T02:28:36.366+0000)
>
> i miss the days when enchanters werent equivalent to point and clicking your ADC, autopath, and then alt tabbing

Enchanters kits have not been changed in so long. When were these days? Every chanter core gameplay has stayed the same.

> [{quoted}](name=I NEED YOU,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r23IhNUv,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-12T02:31:50.206+0000)
>
> Enchanters kits have not been changed in so long. When were these days? Every chanter core gameplay has stayed the same.

Referring to the times when they werent even supports, they were nasty solo laners and toxic in every single way, providing me comedic pleasure at the expense of someone else's soul.
